plot: Death the Kid and the Thompson sisters board a ghost ship full of human souls. After facing the vessel's demented captain, true evil unfurls its wings.
title: Sôru îtâ" Tamashii o kuu kuroki ryuu. Okubyou rizu to yukai na nakama tachi?
plot_es: Death the Kid and the Thompson sisters board a ghost ship full of human souls. After facing the vessel's demented captain, true evil unfurls its wings.
original_name: Sôru îtâ" Tamashii o kuu kuroki ryuu. Okubyou rizu to yukai na nakama tachi?
plot_en: Death the Kid and the Thompson sisters board a ghost ship full of human souls. After facing the vessel's demented captain, true evil unfurls its wings.
